Olympiad 2 (O2) Course

  • Lessons: 20
  • Fee: $1,200 NZD
  • Current Time: TBD
  • Workload: 4–6 hours

There will be 2 hours of teaching per week over 20 weeks, and I expect students to spend about 4–6 hours per week reviewing the material and doing homework. The total time spent in this course should be around 120–180 hours over 2 terms. As the follow-up to the Olympiad 1 (O1) course, this course will continue to develop creative problem-solving skills and proof-writing skills.

Classes

No classes yet! This course will start in the first half of 2026.
